Wow! This will be your expression when you eat their pot biryani. Cooked to perfection. Also tried their keema biryani and that is good too. This is all through online delivery so i am not sure about the ambience
The best chicken biryani in town. Ordered chicken pot biryani 3 times and every time it tasted great. Once ordered mutton keema biryani and it is good too..
Amazing Food. So tasty and yummy. Best food in hyd. I ordered butter chicken and pulka and biriyani.. i love the food. and the delivery was quick too.

Ordered for pot biryani , we are the fan of deepak kitchen but this time its ruin my lunch , they sent uncooked meat and their rice quality became poor very poor , when i contacted them through the phone they said we will look into this and will give u update , but from next call onwards no responce not at all lifting
Very very dissapointed this time.

Ordered Chicken Pot biryani through swiggy. Delivery was quick and packaging was perfect.
Biryani was delivered in a pot packed in cardboard box.
Coming to the taste Biryani was good, it had a spicy flavor. It also Had good amount of chicken pieces. My only disappointment was that some of the chicken pieces were undercooked.

I ordered veg biryani from here.
Taste was good but am really disappointed to spot chicken piece in it.
Totally unacceptable blunder was done!

I did not know this place until I watched the 'Streetbyte's video on top ten best biryanis in Hyderabad.. Thankful to the video now.. üòÑ
We ordered veg biryani and chicken pot biryani from here.. I was pleasantly surprised to see that the biryani is sent along with the pot.. The packaging was good.. üëç 
Coming to the taste, I think it is one of the best authentic pot biryanis in Hyderabad.. The flavors were really nice.. The rice was white in color but still had the rich flavor.. The quantity is good enough for 2 people.. I plan to visit it again to try the other items.. 
My friend said that the veg biryani was not bad.. I Did not taste it though.. 
Pot biryani - 6/7
Packaging - 6/7

Ordered Chicken Pot Biriyani through Swiggy from their Gachibowli outlet. Each dish comes in a clay pot. It is sufficient for two.
Packing:5/5Taste:4/5Value for Money:4/5
Overall Experience:4/5

Heard about these pot biryani from couple of foodies, was on complete veg diet for 3 mnths and was carving for spicy food. Ordered panner 65, Chilli panner from this restaurant. This is undoubtedly one of the best veg biryani i had in hyderabad. Mirchi ka salan was rich in flavour. Couldnt wait for 3 mnths to get over so can try all pot biryanies. Can definitely bet on pot biryani from Deepak Edla's Kitchen.
One of a kind and no competition of it in entire town....biryani is prepared in small pots, enough for two. And the highlight is "each biryani pot is cooked separately". Yes you read it right. Too much hard work goes into serving perferct and pocket friendly biryani.

As usual, Deepak Edla's kitchen Never fails to amaze me with Biryanis. Today, i got tawa chicken biryani and it was so good and flavorful. I ate the whole biryani there was no oil visible and it was so light. Quantity and Quality 10/10.
less than average

I want to add some more notes based on my recent experience with this restaurant, ordered Tawa Mutton Biryani , it was really nice. Delivered earlier than expected , Because of the pot the biryani is really hot even after 30 mins of delivery.

I like your POT Biryani very much.But when I had your Chicken fry and boneless fish fry, they were sweet,tasteless,no spice at all,oily. Chicken is just boiled and covered in masala. Fish fry is hard to chew even.

Don't go for chicken fry.Sweeter to taste, fully oily,pieces were just boiled and cover with masala.No taste in pieces.
Boneless fish fry, its a disaster.Filled with sweetness, hard to chew.Though I like your Pot biryani, this is very disappointing from you.

superb Biryani full of nice flavours and aroma as usual from Deepak Edla's kitchen. chicken pieces are juicy and nicely cooked with good amount of masala. Mirchi salan taste is too good, generally I don't like to mix salan with Biryani until and unless it's missing flavour or madala, but here can't miss this tasty.

Finally tried biryani from this place.¬†
Tried Pot Chicken Biryani and also tried Chicken Majestic ...Food is really good. One more best place to try for Biryani !

I have tasted all 3 (Tawa Chicken, Mutton, and Fish) biryanis from here. And have to say that this place is my new favorite. üòç I loved the taste, the the way you pack the Biryani and all. Much love to this place.
Chicken 65 was absolutely perfect. Chicken roast was too dry. A mixed bag

Today is one regular Friday when I skip lunch from home and rely completely on Zomato. Wanted to get back to Deepak Edla for his signature biryanis. Left a note, "Make it a little bit spicy" with the order.
Order arrived on time. Packaging was amazing. Microwave safe box (My mom wouldn't have thrown the box away after eating). Food was piping hot. Biryani was colorful and Juicy. In fact I was surprised by the amount of Chicken in it. On my note, they made it a bit spicy. Raita and Masala are rich, thick and yummmy.
Deepak Edla's never fail to amaze me. Thanks ZOMATO for APR50.
good one to eat the pot biryani
this is the best
Good food and on time delivery

Finally Deepak Edla is on Zomato....!!
Heard alot about this one . I have ordered Veg biryani and my God the quality and quantity were both more than satisfying to me .
However I would like it little more spicy and the salan they gave in the parcel was very less . But, salan and Biryani together match made in heaven . To me, every bite was full of happiness.
